stimulusHtml: Which of the following would have most strongly favored the principle expressed in the Tenth Amendment?

features.html:
“The powers not delegated to the United States by the Constitution, nor prohibited by it to the States, are reserved to the States respectively, or to the people.”

Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, ratified December 1791

choicesHtml: Former Loyalists who had opposed the American Revolution
Republican members of Congress during Reconstruction
